start: ^I didn't know if you were going to come...

c-0: ^Amy: I didn't know if you were going to come...

neutral1: ^Ethan: Thanks, I wasn't sure if I should, but here I am.
^I'm glad you did, I think there are things to talk about.

c-0: ^Amy: I'm glad you did, I think there are things to talk about.

neutral2: ^Ethan: I'm glad too, although I don't know if we're too late to talk...
^Maybe so, but I don't want to be left in doubt.

c-0: ^Amy: Maybe so, but I don't want to be left in doubt.

realism1: ^Ethan: So let's not keep quiet today
^Why did you walk away so far without saying anything?

c-0: ^Amy: Why did you walk away so far without saying anything?

pain1: ^Ethan: Because I didn't know how to stay without breaking you more
^I didn't need you to be perfect, I just didn't need you to disappear quietly.

c-0: ^Amy: I didn't need you to be perfect, I just didn't need you to disappear quietly.

empathy1: ^Ethan: And I needed you to see me, even if I didn't know how to show myself.
^Amy: We didn't talk when we had the time, but at least we talked about it
^Ethan: If we can't go back, at least we can close this chapter well.
^(Ethan lowers the look and stays in silence)
^Then maybe you were right to leave, at least a part of me was left whole.

c-0: ^Amy: Then maybe you were right to leave, at least a part of me was left whole.

resignation1: ^Ethan: I will never forgive myself for having broken the other part.
^(Ethan lowers the look and stays in silence)

c-0: ^(Sometimes it's not about fixing, it's just about understanding why it broke.)
